evidence.claim: St. Jude Medical Center utilizes AWS Lambda for serverless computing.
The center integrates health records using FHIR standards for patient data.
St. Jude Medical Center employs Azure SQL Database for managing patient data securely.
They support billing processes using X12 837 transaction sets.
Apache Airflow is used for managing workflows that handle healthcare data processing.

icp.icp_reason: Focus on EDI and X12 transactions indicates strong alignment for API-driven healthcare data exchange.
